casebody.data:
Sheffield & Company et al. v. Parker et al. May 13, 1895.

Brought forward from the last term.

Petition for injunction and receiver. Before Judge Pish. Sumter county. June 13, 1894. Port & Watson, Cutts & Hixon and W. P. Wallis, for plaintiffs. E. C. Speer, Ansley & Ansley and L. J. Blalock, for defendants. Atkinson, J.

Under the pleadings and evidence, as disclosed by the record, there-was no abuse of discretion in refusing to grant an injunction and appoint a receiver, as prayed for.

Judgment affirmed.
